fixed_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 129.5/136.0/142.5% of Attack. 72.0/75.6/79.2% chance to inflict Shock for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Thunder Reign

innate_skill.desc: Increase next magic damage by 52.1%/54.7%/57.3%. Lasts for 1 turn.
innate_skill.name: Concentrate

innate_skill.desc: Increase party's Attack by 10.9%/11.4%/12.0%. For every 500 of the user's Attack, increase party's Attack by 0.9%/0.9%/1.0% more, up to 7.2%/7.6%/7.9%. Lasts for 3 turns.
innate_skill.name: Matarukaja

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 14.8%. When only 1 foe is present, increase Electric damage by 26% and critical rate by 10%. If the foe has a debuff, increase the effect by 25% more.
passive_skill.name: Echoing Thunderclap

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 14.8%. When only 1 foe is present, increase Electric damage by 29% and critical rate by 11.5%. If the foe has a debuff, increase the effect by 25% more.
passive_skill.name: Echoing Thunderclap I

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 14.8%. When only 1 foe is present, increase Electric damage by 32% and critical rate by 13%. If the foe has a debuff, increase the effect by 25% more.
passive_skill.name: Echoing Thunderclap II

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical rate by 14.8%. When only 1 foe is present, increase Electric damage by 35% and critical rate by 14.5%. If the foe has a debuff, increase the effect by 25% more.
passive_skill.name: Echoing Thunderclap III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
